questions.question: What is 16% of 250?

How many liters of water must be added to a 32L mixture to make a ratio 4:5?
A can finish a piece of work in 15 days, B in 20 days. In how many days will they finish it together?
If 12 men can do a job in 9 days, in how many days can 18 men do it?
A, B, and C can finish a job in 10, 12, and 15 days respectively. Working together, how long will they take?
If A does half a work in 12 days, how many days will he finish the work alone?

C alone can do a job in 12 days, B alone in 15 days. How long if B and C work together?
